short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Estimates BigQuery spend based on processed data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BigQuery Cost Analyzer is a powerful and intuitive Chrome extension designed to help you monitor and optimize the costs of your BigQuery queries. With this extension, you can instantly visualize the cost of each query you run, allowing you to effectively manage your budget and avoid unexpected expenses.

Features:

Visual Cost Indicators: Easily see the cost of your queries with color-coded indicators:
Green: Cost between $0 and $0.5.
Orange: Cost between $0.5 and $1.
Red: Cost above $1.

Privacy First: No data is collected. The extension uses only DOM data when a BigQuery page is detected.

Optimize your BigQuery usage and stay within budget with BigQuery Cost Analyzer!

Creator : Gary Aflalo
